metadata.title: RHSA-2021:0789: .NET Core 3.1 on Red Hat Enterprise Linux security and bugfix update (Important)
metadata.description:
.NET Core is a managed-software framework. It implements a subset of the .NET framework APIs and several new APIs, and it includes a CLR implementation.

New versions of .NET Core that address a security vulnerability are now available. The updated versions are .NET Core SDK 3.1.113 and .NET Core Runtime 3.1.13.

Security Fix(es):

* dotnet: System.Text.Encodings.Web Remote Code Execution (CVE-2021-26701)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2021-26701 dotnet: System.Text.Encodings.Web Remote Code Execution

platform: .NET Core on Red Hat Enterprise Linux
